lines.setup: Barkly paces nervously in his quarters. The prospect of the reunion party terrifies him. He never knows what to do or say at social events. 'I know what'll relax me.'
lines.anticipating_replicator_creation: looks hard at the serving plate.
lines.responding_to_replicator_creation_succes: That's the Arcturian Fizz that I want.
lines.move_on_to_next_episode: Congratulations! You may now move on to the next episode.
lines.responding_to_replicator_creation_failur: Something is definitely wrong with my Fizz
lines.fix_replicator_request: Please fix it. I really need this drink!
